macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Hang Seng Index Surges Above 26,000 on First Trading Day of 2026 Amid AI Optimism
items.summary: Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index rallied 2.8% to break above 26,000, driven by artificial intelligence developments in China, marking a strong start to the year after 28% gains in 2025. The index needs to sustain above 26,264 to confirm breakout from recent consolidation.

items.title: Nifty 50 Hits New Closing High with Bullish Momentum on January 2
items.summary: India's Nifty 50 rose 0.7% to a record closing high after breaking falling resistance, with strong technical indicators like RSI at 62.39 and positive MACD signaling continued bullish bias. The index eyes 26,500–26,700 if it surpasses 26,350, with support at 26,000–26,100.

items.title: S&P 500 Faces Moderate Reversal After Record Highs, But New Highs Likely
items.summary: The S&P 500, up over 15% in 2025 with 39 all-time highs, underwent a textbook moderate reversal last week amid precious metals selloff, but remains resilient with potential for new highs above 6,940 or 7,000. US Tech 100 stays range-bound between 24,600 and 25,830.

items.title: FOMC Minutes Reveal Close Vote on December Rate Cut, Slight Hawkish Tilt
items.summary: US FOMC meeting minutes indicated the recent rate cut decision was closer than expected, providing a hawkish tilt to future expectations, with CME FedWatch showing only two cuts priced in for next year. This supported modest USD Index gains last week.

items.title: US Economy Signals Solid 2026 Start Ahead of Key December Jobs Data
items.summary: Upcoming December nonfarm payrolls expected at +60k, unemployment at 4.5%, with recent low jobless claims and Q3 GDP at 4.3% y/y suggesting economic resilience; JOLTS and layoffs data also in focus for Fed policy clues.

items.title: Bank Nifty Breaks Out to New High with Strong Bullish Indicators
items.summary: India's Bank Nifty surged 0.74% to a record 60,204 after breaking 59,800, closing above upper Bollinger Bands with RSI at 67.55 and bullish MACD crossover, indicating sustained strength in banking sector.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: TRENDS Research Releases Study on AI Algorithm Transparency
items.summary: TRENDS Research & Advisory published an analytical study on January 4, 2026, focusing on transparency and understanding algorithms in the age of artificial intelligence.

items.title: Scientists Develop Periodic Table for Artificial Intelligence
items.summary: Researchers have created a unifying mathematical framework resembling a periodic table to explain the success of multimodal AI systems.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Animal Crossing New Horizons 3.0 Update Announced for Switch 2
items.summary: A major 3.0 update for Animal Crossing: New Horizons, including a Switch 2 upgrade version, is set to release on January 15, 2026. Content creators are highlighting it as one of the most anticipated releases early in the year.

items.title: Starsand Island Farming Sim Launches February 1, 2026
items.summary: Starsand Island, a farming and life simulation game with supernatural elements, is scheduled for release on February 1, 2026, gaining attention in anticipated 2026 game lists.

items.title: New Games Releasing This Week in Gaming: January 5, 2026
items.summary: Checkpoint Gaming previews the latest game releases coming out during the week of January 5, 2026, covering immediate upcoming titles.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Intel Launches Core Ultra Series 3 (Panther Lake) Processors at CES 2026
items.summary: Intel unveiled its Core Ultra Series 3 processors built on the 18A manufacturing process, targeting premium AI PCs with over 50% performance gains, integrated NPUs, and improved efficiency.

items.title: Samsung Previews AI-Enhanced Micro LED TVs and 6K Odyssey Monitors at First Look Event
items.summary: Samsung's January 4 event showcased Micro LED RGB TVs up to 115 inches, glasses-free 3D 6K Odyssey gaming monitors, and refreshed Bespoke AI appliances with smart home integration.

items.title: Neuralink Announces High-Volume Brain Implant Production for 2026
items.summary: Elon Musk stated Neuralink will scale to high-volume production of brain-computer interfaces in 2026, featuring fully automated surgeries to reach more patients after successful trials.

items.title: NVIDIA's Jensen Huang Delivers CES 2026 Keynote on Hardware Innovations
items.summary: NVIDIA's January 5 CES keynote highlighted latest hardware advancements across gaming, content creation, autonomous vehicles, and healthcare, building on last year's Blackwell launch.

items.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su Keynotes at CES 2026 on January 5
items.summary: AMD Chair and CEO Dr. Lisa Su is scheduled for a 6:30 PM keynote at The Venetian, expected to feature major announcements amid CES media events.
